name: Hyobok Ahn
bio: I'm specialized in Tizen & Tizen RT porting on custom board hardwares. I have experiences in supporting the design of IoT gateway and sensor devices with public Cloud services, such as Samsung SmartThings and AWS.

name: Johnny Nam
bio: I have experiences in Tizen Driver porting projects for Wlan/BT/codec and IoT device development projects based on various scenarios. I also have participated in a network audio project for controlling devices by voice using Alexa and a door lock project for confirming visitors' identification remotely using the AWS.

name: Jinseog Bang
bio: I’m interested in data reduction communication of composite sensors. I was in charge of H/W projects using composite sensors at my previous work and I have experiences in hardware production for collecting sensor data using Zigbee and BLE. I am currently working as a hardware consultant for start-up companies at MakerSpace.

name: Min Su Han
bio: I’m interested in Tizen IoT and its Applications. I have extensive experiences in system application development.  I am the head of software development projects in SINO TECH Co.,Ltd  I can make valuable contributions to the growth of Tizen with my creative plan.

name: Ki Ho Lee
bio: I have developed Tizen programs. And there is a passion for developing IoT devices and programs. I have also improved many techniques for developing IoT device, from 3D modeling to programming. I can design hardware devices and use some programming languages like C, C ++, Java and Python. I am currently the CEO and tutor of Openfingers, a coding education company.

name: Jeong-uk Kwak
bio: I have developed Tizen native applications for the Samsung Family Hub and various consumer electronics. I'm currently focusing on Tizen .NET application development and hope to create a more convenient world with Tizen.

name: Hae-Yeon Hwang
bio: Passionate IT engineer and technical executive director with 24+ year of experience and a proven track record in software and hardware development

name: Jeong Seongmoon
bio: Hello. I'm Jeong Seongmoon a.k.a. msalt, a Korean S/W programmer. I love to create a funny toy project and a Tizen application for real world users. I hope many people will enjoy using and developing Tizen. http://me.msalt.net

name: JungMin O
bio: I enjoy exploring new values by combining technologies. I have the ability to develop in multiple fields, such as firmware, server and client. The experiences I had gained became the basis for developing Tizen apps, and I got the chance to present new experiences to users with Tizen.

name: Heeyeon KIM
bio: I'm interested in IoT projects made with Tizen. I have developed an automatic hand sanitizer module called 'Noormi'. Also, I'm interested in several different things such as big data, machine learning, and A.I. So, I'm going to accumulate a variety of development experience.

name: Jayden Jaehun Choe
bio: Experienced Software Engineer in Embedded, IoT, Automotive and Machine Learning areas. Tizen/NUI is one of the most brilliant embedded software development tools.
